items.name: block-1
items.description: A block with a test module, product-test link, and API route.
items.docs:
## Test Block Configuration

Add the test module to your `medusa-config.ts`:

```ts
modules: [
  {
    resolve: './modules/test',
    options: {
      apiKey: process.env.TEST_API_KEY,
    },
  },
]
```

## Environment Variables

Add the following to your `.env` file:

```
TEST_API_KEY=your-api-key
```

items.name: block-2
items.description: A block with a sample module, product-sample link, workflow, and API route.
items.docs:
## Sample Block Configuration

Add the sample module to your `medusa-config.ts`:

```ts
modules: [
  {
    resolve: './modules/sample',
    options: {
      apiKey: process.env.SAMPLE_API_KEY,
    },
  },
]
```

## Environment Variables

Add the following to your `.env` file:

```
SAMPLE_API_KEY=your-api-key
```
